title: Bounty Inspectors
author: Bounty Inspectors
created_time: July 08, 2023, 05:59:43 AMLast edit: July 08, 2023, 06:23:01 AM by Bounty Inspectors
content: ⛤ WEBSITE ⛤ TELEGRAM Group ⛤  Twitter ⛤__________________________$KLADY Token Already listed on•  Milady Kitty Bounty campaign will run 4 weeks and managed by Bounty Inspectors management service.•  By joining this campaign all participants accept that their works can be used by the team as promotional materials.• All participants must join/follow the  Official social account  of  Milady Kitty  above to get accepted.• using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty campaign immediately and all your account will be banned permanently.• However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We areresponsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.• We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bountycampaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.•  Bounty rewards Distribution will be done by project team 2 weeks after campaign ended.Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address you submitted are final and can't be changed.1. All participants must visit Milady Kitty  Website and must join Milady Kitty's officialTelegram Group and  Twitter.2. All participants must join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channeland Twitter.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Inspectors Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 50+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaigns.8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.9. Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.10. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable. Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquiretoo many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.11. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.12. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted. 13. Rewards will distribute  2 week after campaign ended by project team. Proof of authentication post format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:ERC-20 Wallet Address: Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets /Tweets Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5. [b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5.Twitter               60%Telegram          40%Note: Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 300 approved participants.Telegram:  First 200 approved participants.--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1: 8/07- 14/07Week 2: 15/07 - 21/07Week 3: 22/07 - 28/07Week 4: 29/07- 4/08--> If you have any problem regarding missing stakes, please fill the form below <--Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked once in every week.Rewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/week5. Have more than 15,001 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Kitty Lady Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use @Milady_Kitty #KLADY $KLADY #memecoin #MEXC # Crypto #BTC  hashtags in every retweet or tweet.How to join:1. Join Milady Kitty's official Telegram Group and Twitter Account.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/bFG6ij4jvu4NKhMH7Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | Milady Kitty .(Example: BountyInspectors | Milady Kitty)2. Replace your profile picture with  Milady Kitty Logo.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more than one project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC , Bitmart etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.8. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear Milady Kitty's avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. Join Milady Kitty's official Telegram Group and Twitter Account.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/3wH7MruFv5snsV427
